posts.author: Infra93
posts.content:
I am looking to make a pure monk character. 

-Race: Can be any medium sized, Human favored.
-Could be based on either str-dex-wis, I am not picky about it.


Thanks,
Infra

posts.author: Empyre65
posts.content: Are you playing in a low-magic environment (below +6)? Low-magic favors unarmed Monks while high-magic favors dual kamas.

posts.author: Valerfor
posts.content: For level 20 play, you should also consider (monk 16/ fighter 4), it is a very powerful option as well.
